title: The gaming keyboard you should actually buy - Wooting 60HE
description: Check out Corsairs Xeneon Flex 45WQHD240 OLED Bendable Monitor at   Plouffe's first video on ShortCircuit was the Wooting two HE Analog and now almost two years later, we have the Wooting 60HE. With magnetic Lekker switches, a crazy fast response time, and a reasonable price, is this the gaming keyboard to get?  Check out the Wooting 60HE Mechanical Keyboard:   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.  Want us to unbox something? Make a suggestion at    GET MERCH:   LTX 2023 TICKETS AVAILABLE NOW:   GET EXCLUSIVE CONTENT ON FLOATPLANE:   SPONSORS, AFFILIATES, AND PARTNERS:   PRODUCTS WE USE ON THE SHORTCIRCUIT SET:   FOLLOW US ELSEWHERE ---------------------------------------------------   Twitter:  Instagram:  TikTok:  Facebook:   CHAPTERS --------------------------------------------------- 0:00 Plouffe is a fighter 0:29 Unboxing 1:58 What's a Lekker switch? 2:24 Design impressions 5:05 Sponsor - Corsair 5:36 Wootility software and RGB 9:19 Typing impressions 10:58 Gaming impressions - Forza Horizon 5 12:05 Pricing and overall thoughts 12:50 Outro
